attributes.action: Every city should have community officer patrolling 24 hours to reduce crime.
attributes.additional_details: Put community officers out there patrolling 24 hours in every street in uk
attributes.background: Community officer patrolling 24 hours every street on UK can make big difference reducing crime.criminals are more tempted to do crimes when they see no officers around.let make UK safer

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or House of Commons is responsible for.

Decisions about local policing are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or House of Commons. As a result it is not possible for the Government or House of Commons to take the action you have requested.

We could accept a petition calling for increased funding for additional Police Community Support Officers (PCSOs), although the UK Government is only responsible for policing in England and Wales.
